title: Aesthetic Apparatus: Super compressed sans
content:
Anyone have an idea for the word ’HIGH?’

[http://aestheticapparatus.com/admin/portfolio\_fullsize/C8DEA6\_fullsize.J...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519005015/http:/aestheticapparatus.com/admin/portfolio_fullsize/C8DEA6_fullsize.JPG "http://aestheticapparatus.com/admin/portfolio\_fullsize/C8DEA6\_fullsize.JPG")

 [‹ WHAT'S THIS FONT?!?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519005015/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45344 "Go to previous forum topic") [mono-face ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519005015/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45337 "Go to next forum topic")
author: malmethod

comments.content: Thank you very much for these suggestions!

As far as i know they tend to use [Knockout](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519005015/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?productLineID=100013) which comes in really thin weights like Triple Condensed Gothic. That isn’t Knockout, but its a suitable alternative.
